description: Canada is seeking to establish a contract for Financial and Accounting Services as defined in Annex 'A', Statement of Work, and to be provided under the Contract, on an 'as and when requested' basis only, for one (1) year with four (4) option periods for the Strategic Investments and Partnership group with Natural Resources Canada.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Audit Support Services

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-603-18611783
* **Tender Title:** Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) - NPP
* **Tender Status:** Closed
* **Closing Date:** 2023-11-28T14:00:00

## Contract Details

* **Contract Type:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Duration:** One year, with four option periods
* **Start Date:** 2024-04-01
* **End Date:** 2025-03-31

## Service Requirements

The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) for the Natural Resources Canada. The services will be required to support the Financial and Accounting requirements of the Strategic Investments and Partnership group.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23629/npp_en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23629/apm_fr.pdf>

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact:

* Roya Ayam
* Email: [roya.ayam@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:roya.ayam@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 598-4554

I hope you are satisfied with my rewritten entry! 

Note that I've followed the original formatting as closely as possible, and have only removed unnecessary information. I've also rearranged the information to make it easier to read and understand. 

Let me know if you need any further assistance!
